title: Mistletoe Mischief
description: Super-successful businessman Josh Larkland just didn't "get" Christmas. Parties, eggnog, singing! Why would people want to partake in such frivolous activities when there was interesting work to do? So this year he hired a Christmas "elf". Amanda Kringleton shopped for presents, organized social functions. In short, everything! For the first time in his life, Josh found himself enjoying the holidays--and enjoying Amanda. Was it real or only Christmas magic?
author: Alyssa Dean
